mapper.sql: ip, creatoerId, creatoerName, createTime, companyId, memo
mapper.update: update hm_pub_ip_white set ip=#{ip},memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.IP ip, a.CREATETIME createTime, a.CREATOERID creatoerId, a.CREATOERNAME creatoerName, a.MEMO memo, b.COMPANYNAME companyName, a.companyId companyId FROM hm_pub_ip_white a LEFT JOIN hm_pub_company b ON a.COMPANYID = b.ID WHERE COMPANYID =#{companyId}

SELECT a.ID id, a.HEADIMG imgAdd, a.USERNAME staffName, d.GROUPNAME groupName, b.CREATETIME createTime, b.LASTLOGINIP lastLoginIp, b.LASTLOGINTIME lastLoginTime, b.IPLOCATION ipLocation FROM hm_pub_staff a LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff_detail b ON a.ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff c ON a.ID = c.STAFFID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group d ON c.GROUPID = d.GROUPID WHERE a.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND a.WHITEFLAG = 1
